page.title: 06ST.FRANCIS C.E.SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is called{St. Francis {C.E. Junior School.}Our school has a hall, a staff-room, two large open plan teaching areas, toilets, storage areas and a sanctuary and rooms for use by the church. In addition to the headmaster, there are six teachers, who have a class each, and a part-time remedial reading teacher. We have a housepoint system with the houses being named after St. Aiden (green), St. Cuthbert (yellow), St. Bede (red) and St. Hilda (blue). We have assembly every day and once a month we have a school eucharist. We go on educational visits. The last one was to Eldon. It was very interesting but the walking was terrible! My favourite subject is maths. I like our school it teaches me a lot.
